Reference

Utilites

netrc

Basic utilities for setting, checking and referencing an netrc file

checkNetrc()

Check netrc file

check_nco()

Check to See if NCO is on the system

getNetrcPath()

Get a default netrc file path

writeNetrc()

Write netrc file

Grid

Grid Abrastraction function

geogrid_warp()

Wrap

getSubsets()

Find HDF subsets

make_grid()

Build Grid Abstraction

Cache

Preliminary caching utilites

geo_cache_list()

Manage cached files

geo_path()

Path to cache

MODIS

Basic utilities for downloading and processing MODIS data

day8_to_month()

8day to monthly mean

.modis_dir()

Scrape MODIS molt and mota archives

downloadMODIS()

Download MODIS tiles

mosaicMODIS()

Mosaic/Warp Raw MODIS Tiles

GridMET

Basic utilities for downloading and processing GridMET data

build_normals()

Build Annual Averages and Period Normals

calculate_ai()

Generate Aridity Index (PET/PR)

downloadGridMET()

Download GridMet Daily files

Snow

Basic utilities for downloading and processing snow data

jennings_snow_threshold()

Jennings Snow Threshold

Elevation

Basic utilities for downloading and processing NED

get_ned()

Download the 1 (~30 meter) or 1/3 (~10 meter) arc-second National Elevation Dataset.
